Text.val: - Author: Stephan Huppertz
12.04.2012 JH SCR17241 BDC015A, BDC015C and BDC015D: Added advice limit handling
16.03.2011 JOH/SHZ SCR16306 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY and
GB002 by GB902
07.01.2010 GB SCR15225 Removed part with "report the totals to
the administration department"
12.06.2008 SH SCR13710 BDC015B Finance limits: Extended update of
TLID_COMMISSION (with CCRY501_FLIMITCOSTSCAT3)
24.01.2008 GB SCR13315 Removed test on DEBC_OWNJUDGLIMIT = N for
Observation costs
15.07.2007 GB SCR12754 Added condition also if GSET_YESNO (261) = Y
create a csv-file
09.02.2007 SH SCR12301 BDC015B Added test on ADMN_TESTCLIENTS = N to
all parts where CLNT is selected
10.11.2006 SH SCR12071 BDC015D Added storing of CMON/C_NCREDLIMPROLONG,
CMON/C_NFINLIMPROLONG and CMON/C_NOWNJUDGLIMPROLONG
07.02.2006 SH SCR10321 BDC015B Extended selection of DEBC for credit and finance
limit calculations
09.01.2006 SH SCR10056 BDC015C Removed tests on CLNT502_MONTHLY = Y for
calcuation of credit / finance limits where TLID_COMMISSION is updated
//16-12-2005 JP requested HS #9806: implemented creation of csv-file for HBH
11.11.2005 SH SCR9424 Exrtended test to set v.UPDATES = 'Y' with
" ... and PI.DATE = GNRL_DEBTORLISTDATE"
21.06.2005 SH SCR8467 BDC015 Added delete of TLIT control rows after BMQ001 was
called, see end of BDC015
14.06.2005 SH SCR8467 BDC015D/E will be now only performed if PI.DATE = EOM;
Added module at the end of BDC015 to report totals to admin department (=BMQ001)
08.04.2005 SH SCR8111 BDC015D Moved calc of both v. ACCC_CHANGENO
from R.P. to G.P. on client, see SCR for more details
20.01.2005 SH SCR7689 BDC015A Extended selection of CLCR with " and
ADMN_TESTCLIENTS = N"

11.08.2004 SH SCR6746 BDC015A/BDC015B Added ADMO_COUNTCREDILIMITS='Y'
to selection of BDC015A --> CLCR rows and BDC015B --> CLNT rows
04.08.2004 SH SCR6633 BDC015D Use ADMN_ADMNOGLPACKAGE instead of "HINV" to
get v.HELLER_INVOICENUMBER with GB003
13.07.2004 SH SCR6633 BDC015D Added new field V.HELLER_INVOICENUMBER which
uses for updates of REPA and TMPL
08.06.2004 SH SCR6374 BDC015D Fixed problem with selection of ADML has to be
done with ADMN_ADMNOGLPACKAGE where ADMNO_NO=TLIT_ADMNO
02.06.2004 SH SCR6328 BDC015B Extended selections of DEBC with
DEBC_DATDELETED = NULL
22.04.2004 SH SCR6061 BDC015D Uses TLIT_LEDGERNO_TAXAMOUNTS for
TMPL_LEDG_NO if TMPL row will be created for ledger bookings and TLIT_TAX>0
14.04.2004 SH SCR5937 BDC015C Changed argument for PI.TYPE --> BCM006
01.04.2004 SH SCR5854 BDC015D Update TMIT_JOURNALNO with REPA_JOURNALNO
31.03.2004 SH SCR5855 Remove the test DEBC_CREDIT/FINANCELIMITDATE = mmyyyy
- of PI.DATE in BXA015B where the credit / finance observation costs has to be
- calculated.
31.03.2004 SH SCR5850 BDC015D Finance limit/ Finance limit observation costs -->
- Extended selection of DEBC rows with DEBC_FINANCELIMIT>CLNT411_MINFINANCELIMIT
26.03.2004 SH SCR5488 Fixed parameter mismatch for the call to BPH107
24.03.2004 SH SCR5488 Changes in different modules, see SCR for details
23.03.2004 SH SCR5488 Changes in different modules, see SCR for details

-- Global values

-- Only if PI.DATE = EOM then updates in steps BDC015D/E have to be performed
... only if PI.DATE = EOM
- Do not remove index 1, need to build descending SORT
-- This is no restart, delete all TLIT/TLID rows and start BDC015A
-- Check if it's a restart, TRUE if TLIT_TYPEOFCHARGE =10 or 20 or 30 or 40
- Delete all related TLID rows
-- Only if min one CLCR row was selected and one TLID was written to
-- database, we write one TLIT row database, ss T.S.
-- INFO: All calculations are in one transaction
@Although the selection of CLNT and DEBC rows is nearly the same for the 3
following calculations, this structure is better for future maintenance,
specially if the logic has to be changed only for one calculation!

- Trigger uses to report totals to administration deparment at the end of BDC015
-- Uses in Step3 Store account changes and Step4 Update Client month

.. in client currency
... in heller currency

INFO: ACCC_CHANGENO (s) have to be calc in G.P. because we need the
numbers in Step6 Ledger bookings --> Record Level and in Step3 Store Account
changes --> Group Level. It's possible that the second number will not be used,
because no tax was calculated.
-- Step 4 Update Client month
-- Reset virtuals

-- Uses in Step3 Store account changes

.. for settlement account (limit costs)
.. for the income
.. for settlement account (tax)
... for the tax
-- Step7 Finaly update per record
-- With client currency
-- With admin currency
-- Create CMON row in client currency
-- Create CMON row in heller currency
-- Calculate some totals which used to store CMON
-- Update CMON row in client currency
-- Update CMON row in heller currency

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT COUNT(*), TLID_TYPEOFCHARGE from :1/TLID WHERE TLID_ADMNO = :2 AND TLID_CLNTNO = :3 AND TLID_TYPEOFCHARGE in(11, 12, 13, 21, 23) GROUP BY TLID_TYPEOFCHARGE ORDER BY TLID_TYPEOFCHARGE FOR FETCH ONLY OPTIMIZE FOR 100 ROWS

Text.val: -- Updates independently from currency

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT TLID_ADMNO, TLID_CLNTNO, TLID_COUNTRY, TLID_TYPEOFCHARGE, CAST(SUM(TLID_COMMISSION) as decimal (18,2)), CAST(SUM(TLID_COMMISSIONURGENT) as decimal (18,2)), CAST(SUM(TLID_INFOSOURCECOSTS) as decimal (18,2)), COUNT(*) from :1/TLID WHERE TLID_ADMNO = :2 AND TLID_CLNTNO = :3 GROUP BY TLID_ADMNO, TLID_CLNTNO, TLID_COUNTRY, TLID_TYPEOFCHARGE ORDER BY TLID_ADMNO, TLID_CLNTNO, TLID_COUNTRY, TLID_TYPEOFCHARGE FOR FETCH ONLY OPTIMIZE FOR 100 ROWS

Text.val: .. in client currency
... in admin currency

-- Calculate taotals

-- Create CMOC row in admin currency

-- Update CMOC row in admin currency
